text: Najljepše pjesme (trans. The most beautiful songs) is a compilation album of Dino Merlin with the Merlin band as well. This compilation album was released in 1995. ==Track listing== #Učini mi pravu stvar #Nešto lijepo treba da se desi #Moja bogda sna #Vojnik sreće #Zaboravi #Pala magla #Nek' padaju ćuskije #Danas sam OK #Kad zamirišu jorgovani #Kokuzna vremena #Bosnom behar probeharao #Mjesečina ==External links== *Najljepše pjesme on Dino Merlin's official web site Category:1995 greatest hits albums Category:Dino Merlin albums Category:Nimfa Sound albums
title: Najljepše pjesme
